page.title: 20SCHOOLS
page.content: At the age of four ,or nearly five , you start in the First School. Then when you are nine you start in the Middle School. When you are thirteen you leave and start at the High School. You can leave the High School when you are sixteen ,or you can stay on at the High School until you are eighteen. Valley Gardens is a Middle School with children aged nine to thirteen. My sister is already at Valley Gardens and I am starting in the first year in September. I am going to look around the school on Wednesday. My Mum was at Valley Gardens when she was at school. That shows how old Valley Gardens is. A few years ago a new building was built. It is now the first year block.
